title: No. 645 Farmer's Market Sunflowers 2
content: Farmer's Market Sunflowers 2 Oil on Linen Panel 7" x 5"   I am thoroughly enjoying the Everett Farmer's Market. There are three or four booths bursting at the seams with locally grown flowers. It is a  blast wandering from booth to booth looking for the perfect bouquet. :)   This week was the beginning of my Monday evening class. Lucky me! I have not one but two wonderful groups of students to teach.     ﻿   Jill blocking in her pear.   Emily painting with purpose and finesse.   Shannon on fire! Her second painting of the evening.
